lst.name: sentence
lst.str: At the State Department, Secretary of State George Shultz is being advised the "Baker plan is going through a rough patch" while Treasury officials are urging commercial banks to adopt more flexible approaches to guarantee their continued participation in the plan.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The talks come after Brazil's interest rate moratorium and an uncompromising stand by the country's finance minister, Dilson Funaro, after talks with western leaders.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Even though the Fed chief joined Baker in expressing more confidence in an optimistic outcome, Volcker was especially concerned about the political risks, and in particular the fatigue with belt-tightening.

lst.str: Even though the Fed chief joined Baker in expressing more confidence in an optimistic outcome, Volcker was especially concerned about the political risks, and in particular the fatigue with belt-tightening.
